Text.Page:
Want more orders, do you? Well, let's see what I've got here....

All right, utter darkness in the minesâ€”kill off the {@LinkCreature:20#30140000#Lokian reapers}, {@LinkCreature:20#30143000#Lokian ebonweavers}, {@LinkCreature:20#30141000#Lokian blood mages}, {@LinkCreature:20#30120101#devan rippers}, and {@LinkCreature:20#30120100#devan outriders}.

Talk to Arthgal in the Halls of Utterdark when you've finished that up.
You've done good work out there! This is a sign of our appreciation.
You've come to chat, I assume?
